titleStmt.title: A royal arbor of loyal poesie consisting of poems and songs digested into triumph, elegy, satyr, love & drollery / composed by Tho. Jordan.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Eliz. Andrews ...,
